name: Loadsys Solutions
tagline: Award winning Web development company from Chicago
description:
Loadsys is one of the top software developers and digital solutions consultancy headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. We develop cutting edge applications for enterprise companies from United States and globally.
 
Established in 2006, Loadsys provides services and has expertise in multiple industries including Manufacturing, Insurance, Logistics, and Education to name a few.
 
Our primary technologies are the CakePHP, Laravel and Ruby on Rails frameworks in addition to React Native for cross-platform mobile development. We are highly experienced in Amazon Web Services and nearly all of the facilities they provide.
 
Our mission is to help enterprise companies adopt digital transformation and accelerate operations through innovative technology solutions like Edge-to-Cloud Computing, IoT devices, and AI applications.
